activities.description: Choose a machine learning algorithm (e.g., support vector machines). Develop a presentation outline in Chinese, focusing on key concepts, technical terms, and application examples.  The AI assistant will help structure the content and provide feedback on clarity and logical flow.
Rehearse delivering your presentation using formal Chinese vocabulary related to machine learning.  The AI assistant will provide real-time feedback on pronunciation, fluency, and grammar.

Select a machine learning debate topic (e.g., the advantages and disadvantages of deep learning).  The AI assistant will help you find relevant information, formulate arguments, and suggest counter-arguments.

Develop arguments and counterarguments in Chinese, focusing on technical details and logical reasoning.  The AI assistant will review your arguments for clarity, completeness, and potential logical fallacies.

Engage in a simulated discussion about machine learning topics with an AI-powered language partner. The AI assistant will provide relevant prompts, challenging questions, and feedback on your responses using a predefined set of machine learning scenarios.

Analyze your discussion responses, identify areas for improvement in communication, and practice using more precise technical vocabulary in Chinese. The AI will suggest alternative phrases and sentence structures.

Present a simplified machine learning project to the AI assistant, focusing on the application of previously learned Chinese vocabulary and structures. The AI will provide feedback on the clarity and technical accuracy of your presentation.
Review and practice technical terms relevant to machine learning projects. The AI assistant will provide a list of technical terms and their Chinese translations, followed by practice exercises.

Revise your presentation based on the previous day's feedback.  The AI assistant will provide structured feedback and suggestions for improvements in clarity, structure, and technical accuracy.  Record yourself and the revised presentation.
Practice delivering the revised presentation with the AI assistant.  Focus on fluency, pronunciation, and confidence.

Reflect on the week's progress, noting what you found challenging and what you accomplished. The AI assistant will guide you in structuring your reflection, and you can identify specific areas for improvement or further study.
Review key vocabulary and phrases associated with machine learning and debate.  The AI will present exercises to review and practice using these phrases and terms.

Apply learned technical Chinese to a more complex machine learning problem. The AI will provide a hypothetical problem statement, and you will solve it while articulating your thought process in Chinese.
Set personal learning goals and plan for the upcoming week, reflecting on areas for continued improvement.
